subject: Vam pro
description_text:
Hello just received my vam pro. Configured it through samsonn manager but not work in game( raceroom)

Any solution
Sent from my iPad

conversations.body_text: Hi Fezan J,  Our current SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 only supports around ten games. You can try the latest SimHub, which supports over 100 games.

So my game isnt compitable. It is listed on the app
Sent from my iPad

>
Hi Fezan J,     I will have our engineer test it. This game isn’t commonly used on our side, so it hasn’t been tested before.
